name: Briscola - La Brisca
description:
Welcome to the classic cards game Briscola (La Brisca).
Who has not played this popular game in his childhood?
Play now the ultimate and popular Spanish cards game!

[ HIGHLIGHTS ]
* Cards deck images in high definition
* Possibility to select the Spanish deck, poker or Italian (napoletane).
* Now you can also change the card size.
* Lots of high definition reverses.
* Incredible animations and effects.
* Play Online with friends or Offline vs AI.
* Simple and minimalist interface.
* Includes a Tutorial and a very complete help.
* Realistic sounds with the possibility of adjusting the volume.
* Optimized graphics to use less battery.
* All Briscola rules are customizable.
* Beautiful and simple user interface (portrait and landscape)
* And a lot more...

[ GAME MODES ]
* Tutorial.
* Practice mode (allows you to undo the movements)
* Single player (4 difficulty levels)
* Two players
* Online Game

Just one more thing...
ENJOY !!!
